snippet.title: Classic Game Room - MINIATURE GOLF review on Atari 2600
snippet.description:
Miniature Golf Atari 2600 review! 

Ethel the CYBORG NINJA on Kickstarter! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1156035777/ethel-the-cyborg-ninja-book-1

Subscribe to http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Follow http://www.instagram.com/ClassicGameRoom
http://www.twitter.com/ClassicGameRoom
http://www.facebook.com/ClassicGameRoom

Ethel Cyborg Ninja accounts!
http://www.twitter.com/EthelCyborg
http://www.instagram/EthelCyborgNinja

Classic Game Room reviews MINIATURE GOLF for Atari 2600 released in 1979. Enjoy the thrills of putt-putt golf (without any of the ice cream) in this unrealistic, yet enjoyable, old school classic sports game for Atari VCS. Aim your shot, pull back the club and bank the ball of walls for the most distance, this retro classic is a great party game and good fun if you can find it for pennies. Ninja Golf is superior.
